page.title: 06SCHOOLS IN NE. PLYMOUTH
page.content: {ESTOVER C.P.}(701 CHILDREN)-13 JUNIOR} CLASSES,9 INF.12 MOBILE CLASSROOMS. {OTHER SCHOOLS}-LEIGHAM,THORNBURY, AUSTIN FARM,ST.EDWARDS C.OF E.(250 CHILDREN). PUPILS FROM THESE SCHOOLS GO TO ESTOVER COMP.(900 CHILDREN), EGGBUCKLAND,ST.BONIFACE R.C.1 NURSERY UNIT(25-50 CHILDREN WILL ATTEND ON OPENING OF EXTENSION){.STAFF AT {ESTOVER C.P.}26 TEACHERS,3 INFANT HELPERS, 3 M.T.A'S. 2 SECRETARIES, 1 CARETAKER, 7, CLEANING LADIES. {CLUBS:}GYMNASTICS,Y.O.C.,MUSIC,ART, CLAY,NEEDLEWORK,CHORAL SPEAKING, COMPUTER,NETBALL,FOOTBALL,ATHLETICS, SWIMMING.{LOCAL SCHOOL EVENTS:}FETES, DISCOS,PARTIES,EXHIBITIONS,PANTOMINES, CAROL SERVICES,NETBALL,FOOTBALL MATCHES, ROAD SAFETY COMP. SPORTS DAYS SWIMMING GALAS. ESTOVER C.P. SCHOOL HAS HELD 22 EVENTS THIS SCHOOL YEAR. MOST FAVOURITE EVENT-SWIMMING GALA!
